title: Walmart launches swim and activewear brand, Love & Sports

contentObject.content: Walmart Inc. (WMT) announced the launch of a new exclusive brand, Love & Sports, created with fashion designer Michelle Smith and indoor cyclist Stacey Griffith. Items are made with "high-performance" fabrics and are intended to go from the gym to daily activities. The collection includes 121 items priced from $12 to $42 and include running shorts, one- and two-piece swimsuits and nylon jackets. Walmart stock has advanced 10.5% over the last year.
